item.title: 5k stam
item.content:encoded:
This is the opening quest to a line of content called 'Hero's Quest', which is designed to come after all current content at time of writing. You need to beat R00t and PizzaWitch both ways, and then beat WorldKaiju content. The recommended season is 24+ (recommended for PW hard and WK) and you MUST complete glowslinging to unlock the quest.
By the time a player does all this and qualifies for HQ, their daily stam should be 860. Awesome points should be invested in full Appetite and Glowslinging as standard. If they're in a strong village capable of running science 6 daily they can expect their daily app to be 900 more often than not, which is 15 TACOs (+1 for free from Cipher level 2), +20% roughly when using TACOS ally in team. From the expected 19 tacos you get 3,610 stamina. Add that to your daily base stamina (let's say somewhere in the region of 1-1.4k) it's not all that difficult to get naturally. Then there are plenty of appetite boosts in the game -an extra TACO at this point would give you 290 stamina, increasing with each TACO. Then there are non-free stamina boosts themselves- 300+300 from a weekly free favour from Eleven Tails (the reward you get from beating R00t) and one of your own, 200 from Z-Reward… I'll also mention party house juice for more app (better than the stam juice by far), and a couple of Flower Wars powers (the Mahjong power gives +app which is more advisable).

It's even easier if you care to use a TACODELUXE or few, or wait until Festival day [the 11th of the month] … but those two make it a little bit too easy. If you're ready for Hero's Quest, you'll be able to pass this check without breaking a sweat. If you're not, you probably can't unlock it yet. But if you just seek the know-how, I can edit this post with links on the keywords and more detail where requested (as if it wasn't long enough).

p.s. I'll point you to the permanent item checker in regards to perms. http://timothydryke.byethost17.com/billy/itemchecker.php
